scripts.graph-create-local: yarn workspace @robusta/subgraph graph create --node http://localhost:8020/ robusta/option
scripts.graph-remove-local: yarn workspace @robusta/subgraph graph remove --node http://localhost:8020/ robusta/option
scripts.graph-deploy-local: yarn workspace @robusta/subgraph graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 robusta/option
scripts.graph-ship-local: yarn graph-prepare && yarn graph-codegen && yarn graph-deploy-local
